p: The Temcha basin is located at the centre on the north side of the Abay basin and covers an area of 5,526 km 2 with an altitudinal range extending from 748 m asl up to 4088 m asl. Rainfall data from WLRC and from CFSR were used for simulation. The Temcha sub-basin contributes an average of 2.4% to the total outflow of the Abay Basin.
